resources.string: We sent a verification email to
Want to change your email address?
Your email has been successfully verified. You can now log in.
Your email has not been verified. Please check your inbox for the verification link.
Password must be at least 6 characters long.
Hello! I specialize in selling used electronics and gadgets...
Your account is currently deactivated. Do you want to reactivate it?
E.g., phone number, social media link
Your payment will be held securely.
You receive and approve the item.
Payment is released to the seller.
You have no payment transactions yet.
Discover unique items and sell what you no longer need!
Enter location manually or use GPS

Location permission is required to get your current location.

Unable to load items near you.
No browsing history found for personalization.
Location permission denied. Cannot display items near you.
Selling Samsung Galaxy S22, 90% new, used for 1 year. Charger included.
Failed to load item details: Empty data.
Cannot record user view: missing userId, itemId or category.
Please log in to send an offer.
Cannot send offer: Missing item or seller information.
Please log in to add to favorites.
Cannot add to favorites: Missing item ID.
Invalid chat participants: currentUserId or otherUserId is null/same.
There\'s a new offer for your product \"%1$s\".

You cannot report your own item.
Cannot report at this time. Please try again.
Your report has been submitted successfully.
You don\'t have any listings yet. Create a new one!
You need to log in to view your listings.

Counter price must be greater than 0.

New offer price must be greater than 0.

Counter offer sent. Waiting for buyer\'s response.
This offer has been superseded by a new negotiation.

Please enter a new offer price.
New offer price must be greater than 0.

Your offer for "%s" has been rejected.
